per_frame_1=q1 = 0.0003*(pow(1+1.2*bass+0.4*bass_att+0.1*treb+0.1*treb_att+0.1*mid+0.1*mid_att,6));
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 1*sin(time*0.339);
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + 1*sin(time*0.369);
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_b + 1*sin(time*0.399);
per_frame_5=wave_x = wave_x + 0.3*sin(time);
per_frame_6=wave_y = wave_y + 0.3*cos(time);
per_frame_7=ib_r = ib_r + 1*sin(time*0.565);
per_frame_8=ib_g = ib_g + 1*sin(time*0.615);
per_frame_9=ib_b = ib_b + 1*sin(time*0.665);
per_frame_10=ob_r = ob_r + 1*cos(time*0.565);
per_frame_11=ob_g = ob_g + 1*cos(time*0.615);
per_frame_12=ob_b = ob_b + 1*cos(time*0.665);
per_frame_13=//ib_size = ib_size + 0.035*bass;
per_frame_14=warp = 0;
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom - 0.025*sin(fps*6.6);
per_pixel_2=zoom = zoom - 0.035*sin(ang*11+(time));
per_pixel_3=rot = rot + 0.005*sin(fps*5.8);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`uv = frac(uv);
warp_4=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 1 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_5=`float2 d = texsize.zw*12;
warp_6=`float3 dx = (2*GetBlur3(uv_orig + float2(1,0)*d) - 2*GetBlur3(uv_orig -float2(1,0)*d))*0.5;
warp_7=`float3 dy = (2*GetBlur3(uv_orig + float2(0,1)*d) - 2*GetBlur3(uv_orig -float2(0,1)*d))*0.5;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 uvx = uv
warp_10=`           + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xy-0.5)*texsize.zw*0
warp_11=`           - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw*0;
warp_12=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uvx ).x
warp_13=`          - (GetBlur3(uvx)-tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uvx )).x*0.1
warp_14=`          - 0.035;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`float2 uvy = uv_orig
warp_17=`           + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xy-0.5)*texsize.zw*4
warp_18=`           - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw*4
warp_19=`           + float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*8;
warp_20=`
warp_21=`ret.y = tex2d(sampler_fc_main,uvy).y
warp_22=`      + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)*0.1
warp_23=`      - 0.012
warp_24=`      + (tex2d(sampler_pc_main,uv_orig).z)*0.2;
warp_25=`
warp_26=`
warp_27=`float2 uvz = uv_orig
warp_28=`           + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xy-0.5)*texsize.zw*2
warp_29=`           + float2(dy.x,-dx.x)*texsize.zw*64
warp_30=`           + float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw*0;
warp_31=`ret.z = tex2d(sampler_fc_main,uvz).z
warp_32=`      + (tex2d(sampler_fc_main,uvz).z-GetBlur2(uvz).z)*0.2 
warp_33=`      + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz)*0.1
warp_34=`      - GetBlur3(uv_orig).x
warp_35=`      - saturate(1-GetBlur2(uv_orig).x)*0.04;
warp_36=`}
comp_1=`float2 d;
comp_2=`float3 dx, dy;
comp_3=`
comp_4=`shader_body
comp_5=`{
comp_6=`   d = texsize.zw*1.5;
comp_7=`   dx = GetPixel(uv_orig + float2(1,0)*d) - GetPixel(uv_orig - float2(1,0)*d);
comp_8=`   dy = GetPixel(uv_orig + float2(0,1)*d) - GetPixel(uv_orig - float2(0,1)*d);
comp_9=`
comp_10=`
comp_11=`ret = GetPixel(uv).x*(1-length(float2(dx.y,dy.y)*8))*pow(hue_shader,6)*1.4;
comp_12=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(1,1,1),length(float2(dx.z,dy.z)*4));
comp_13=`
comp_14=`
comp_15=`}
